definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Moth whose larvae live in and feed on bee honeycombs.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲生活在蜂窩中並以蜂窩爲食的蛾子。

sentences.english: Do you know why moths are brown?
sentences.chinese: 你知道蛾子爲什麼是棕色的嗎？

sentences.english: At summer night, the sound of cicadas is around him, a moth spinning ceaselessly. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的夜晚，周圍都是蟬鳴，一隻蛾子在不停地打轉。

sentences.english: the moths are flying around the light poles.
The moth's habitat is being destroyed and it has nearly died out.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛾子因棲息地正受到破壞，幾乎絕種了。

sentences.english: So he passed the time building a moth collection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爲了打發時間，他開始了收集蛾子的工作。

sentences.english: Under the starlight, the moths are flying around the light poles.
sentences.chinese: 在星光下，蛾子繞着路燈柱飛舞。

sentences.english: Moths ate holes in my wool coat.
sentences.chinese: 蛾子把我的羊毛外衣蛀了幾個洞。

sentences.english: The pupae remain dormant in the soil until they emerge as adult moths in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 蛹蟄伏在土壤中，直到冬天它們才蛻變成蛾子飛出來。

sentences.english: Later he showed me the beautiful moths he was breeding.
sentences.chinese: 然後他給我看了他養的那些漂亮的蛾子。

sentences.english: Silkworms are the larva of the mulberry silk moth.
sentences.chinese: 絲蠶其實是桑樹蛾子的幼蟲。

definition: common word for ladybug, more formally 瓢虫
